help.title: Sea Vixen FAW2
help.line: Take Off(Airfield): Raise nosewheel at 100kts, allow to fly off at 140-160 kts
Raise Gear and Flaps before 220 kts IAS
Take Off(Carrier): Use full flaps, adopt 9 degrees incidence at end of Cat;
once climbing steadily, raise gear - raise flaps to 20 degrees after 140kts are attained
raise remainder of flap after confirming that the aircraft is still accelerating.
Landing: reduce speed to 220 kts, lower gear and select 20 degrees flap;
Be aware of the increased elevator gearing with gear selected down
Approach at 150kts (around 125 for carrier) with full flap, and engage auto-throttle
Upon touchdown close throttles, lower nosewheel around 90 kts while still under rudder authority
